author: andschwa
body: This is a bug on Linux that we need to demonstrate and file against .NET CLI.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I don't think so. This was reported by @JamesWTruher and we intended to provide a repro so it could be fixed... but .NET CLI has undergone so much churn we'd have to see if it's even still a bug.

title: Repro .NET CLI content failing with .dotfiles
